review.title: “Expects all of your time with low pay”
review.pros: Pros – They will teach you about the oil and gas business.Every other Friday off.Nice people.Relaxed environment.
review.cons: Cons – They don't pay what they could.

review.title: “You have now worked for the probably the worst company ever.”
review.pros: Pros – There are no pros except the 9/80 workweek
review.cons: Cons – All employees are disposable, They have no loyalty except to the family members working for the company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I don't think they would listen to anybody.
